author: Mandy Dunn
method: Place the butter, brown sugar, golden syrup and vanilla pod in a small saucepan. Bring to a gentle simmer. Remove from the heat and add the lemon juice to taste. Stir in the double cream. Remove the vanilla pod before serving.
ingredients: 50g/2oz butter,  50g/2oz soft brown sugar,  50g/2oz golden syrup,  vanilla pod, split,  lemon juice (approx 1/3 lemon),  75ml/2Â½fl oz double cream
